title: CTSI Leader Named to State COVID-19 Panel
cleaned_text: Peter Szilagyi, M.D., M.P.H. On Monday, Gov. Gavin Newsom named Szilagyi and 10 other nationally known California physician scientists with expertise in immunization and public health to the state's COVID-19 Scientific Safety Review Workgroup that will independently review the safety and efficacy of any vaccine that receives U.S. Food and Drug Administration approval for distribution.
